title: Ep. 16 CockTales 2.0 "New Year New Me!"
description:
Happy New Year!!! We are so excited that we have some major changes!!!

1. No more bad sound...we're now recording at Means Street Studios in Atlanta, so we have a super crispy new sound!!

2. Everybody welcome Medinah @coffeebeandean and leave some cocktail emojis on her Instagram. She's officially part of the crew and we know you'll love her.

3. We also have some events coming this year, follow each of us as well as @cocktalespodcast (IG deleted our old page) to be the first to know about it.

Kiki- @KikiSaidSo
Medinah- @Coffeebeandean
Shayla- @TVHost4You

This week we talked about the best dates, Mariah Carey's awful performance, and what to do when your baby daddy gives your Herpes and you want to date new people. Yea. It gets real!

Send all listener questions to cocktales.atl@gmail.com

Download LYFT and use code: KIKIANDSHAYLA to score free ride credits

If you're in Atlanta, go to https://taglinesclothinglaunch.eventbrite.com for your tickets. Kiki will be hosting and there's tons of vendors, food, and drinks!
itunes:author: Kiki Said So & Medinah Monroe
